page.title: 04HOME LIFE_THE BOAITTS
page.content: HOME LIFE - THE BOAITT'S MR. Boaitt works in Bristol as a consultant engineer. He travels to work by car or train and is out of the house for about 13 hours a day. Mrs. Boaitt used to work in Cheltenham but now that they have 3 children looks after them. When they are old enough they will go to Tibberton Primary School. They will start in the September of the school year in which they are 5. When they are 11 they will then go to Newent Comprehensive School. They will be able to walk to the primary school but they will travel by bus to the comprehensive school.There is a play group for the under 5's and Mrs. Boaitts 3 year old twins attend. There is a public bus service through Tibberton but most people travel by car as it is much more convenient.
